name: Canva Inc.
description: Operator of an online graphic design platform intended to democratize access to design and visual communication. The company's platform offers drag-and-drop features and professional layouts to consistently design graphics through a vast collection of professionally designed layouts to personalize the design with a stock library of photographs, illustrations and imagery, enabling companies and users to design presentations, and social media graphics with appropriate layouts.
